author: guitargeek
body:
Some changes I made already some time ago when revamping the PhotonIDValueMapProducer, but I didn't want to put in the technical Photon MVA PR since it affects more than the MVA. Maybe they are useful to keep RecoEgamma/*Identification clean.

* Inspired by the HEEP ID, all producers now handle the MiniAOD/AOD token duality in the same way, using the new MultiToken class.
* The writeValueMap function, which got defined in every single producer, is now defined only once in EgammaTools.
title: New MultiTokens make AOD/MiniAOD auto-detection easier
